DataElement.preferredDefinition: Classification of the summary assessment based on an imaging study(ies).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to an examination method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation being performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: (beh-NINE) Not cancerous; does not invade nearby tissue or spread to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: For neoplasms, a non-infiltrating and non-metastasizing neoplastic process that is characterized by the absence of morphologic features associated with malignancy (e.g., severe atypia, nuclear pleomorphism, tumor cell necrosis, and abnormal mitoses). For other conditions, a process that is mild in nature and not dangerous to health.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: Deviating from the norm.: To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.
To improve the quality of something; make better or more attractive.
A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An elevated level or position or degree; greater than normal in degree or intensity or amount.: A proposal offered for acceptance or rejection.: Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.

Concepts.definition: An elevated level or position or degree; greater than normal in degree or intensity or amount.
A proposal offered for acceptance or rejection.
Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.: Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.: (beh-NINE) Not cancerous; does not invade nearby tissue or spread to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

For neoplasms, a non-infiltrating and non-metastasizing neoplastic process that is characterized by the absence of morphologic features associated with malignancy (e.g., severe atypia, nuclear pleomorphism, tumor cell necrosis, and abnormal mitoses). For other conditions, a process that is mild in nature and not dangerous to health.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An impression that something is possible or probable.: A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

Concepts.definition: An impression that something is possible or probable.
A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary): Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.: Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.: Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.

Concepts.definition: Added; extra; further.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.
Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for BOLD Imaging data collection
